channel.title: HOME on Geir Okkenhaug Jerstad
channel.description: Recent content in HOME on Geir Okkenhaug Jerstad

item.title: About me
item.description:
Introduction

Born in Oslo, Norway in 1973. Lived in Kristiansand, Norway since 1983.

Got my first computer in 1985, a Commodore64

item.title: Web site project
item.description: A quick overview of of the static page generator HUGO. Hugo Go Hugo Hugo is the most well known of the static web-page generators. It has a large community, and development. Theme personal-web Starter theme for me, looking to make (it) my own. Reasonable clean, might look to strip some of it away. Maybe move to pico css.

item.title: Demo Page
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Config File
item.description:
Here is the basic config file used for personal-web.

You can use it as a base for your website.
